item.title: Final Review
item.description: CSCC43 - Final Review # Fall 2021 # Thank god the SQL to this course is an elective. Database Management System (DBMS) # Database: A structured system to persist data over a long period of time, with certain rules imposing it DBMS: Software to manage databases Manages data from multiple databases Enforces rules on the data Types of DMBS # Relational (RDBMS) Examples: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, SQLite Hierarchical Networked Object-Oriented NoSQL Key Concepts Overview # Data Model # A collection of tools for describing data, data relationships and semantics, and consistency constraints
